Table.sql: SELECT case when g.maicd in ('A91','A91.1','A91.-1','A91.+1') then '01' else case when g.maicd in ('A91.2','A91.-2','A91.+2') then '02' else case when g.maicd in ('A91.3','A91.-3','A91.+3') then '03' else case when g.maicd in ('A91.4','A91.-4','A91.+4') then '04' else case when g.maicd='A83.0' then '05' else case when g.maicd='A86' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'A87%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'G04%' then '08' else case when g.maicd like 'B05%' then '09' else case when g.maicd like 'B50%' then '10' else case when g.maicd like 'B51%' then '11' else case when g.maicd like 'B54%' then '12' else case when g.maicd like 'B52%' then '13' else case when g.maicd like 'J%' then '14' else '15' end end end end end end end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN, substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD,' ' ttlucrk,' ' ngayrk,' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM btdbn a,benhandt g,btdpxa b,btdquan c,btdtt d,QUANHE h,lienhe i,noigioithieu x,dstt y WHERE a.MABN = g.MABN and a.MAPHUONGXA = b.MAPHUONGXA and a.MAQU = c.MAQU and a.MATT = d.MATT and g.MAQL = h.MAQL(+) and g.maql=i.maql and g.maql=x.maql(+) and x.mabv=y.mabv(+) and g.LOAIBA<>1
Table.cont: (g.maicd in ('A91','A91.1','A91.-1','A91.+1') or g.maicd in ('A91.2','A91.-2','A91.+2') or g.maicd in ('A91.3','A91.-3','A91.+3') or g.maicd in ('A91.4','A91.-4','A91.+4') or g.maicd='A83.0' or g.maicd='A86' or g.maicd like 'A87%' or g.maicd like 'G04%' or g.maicd like 'B05%' or g.maicd like 'B50%' or g.maicd like 'B51%' or g.maicd like 'B54%' or g.maicd like 'B52%' or g.maicd like 'J%')
